question: Based on the given evidence, is the hypothesis 'ROUGE Dior Colored Lip Balm 999 either is refillable or has "rosewood" in its official description.' true, false, or uncertain? content.source_5: ROUGE Dior Colored Lip Balm 999 is a lipstick in this set.
content.source_6: ROUGE Dior Colored Lip Balm 999 either has "rosewood" in its official description or has a velvet finish.
content.source_7: In the Rouge Dior line, colored lip balms are typically satin-finish rather than velvet-finish.
